title: Distance Teacher Training Program: Language Education Competency Enhancement Based on Deep Learning Design

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational Educational Theory and Teaching Experience
context.additional_context: Language Education Competency Development Program Combining Self-Directed and Deep Learning Design in Non-Real-Time Digital Learning Environments

learning_goals: Learners can apply in-depth learning strategies using SLM (Self-Learning Materials) in job environments with over 80% accuracy.
Learners can propose at least three practical solutions to real-world problems encountered in language curriculum design through peer feedback and case analysis.
Learners can achieve a monthly learning goal attainment rate of over 90% via LMS-based formative assessments.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
